casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

January 29, 2008

[Cite as 01/29/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-Ohio-283.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-0057. State v. Harris.

Cuyahoga App. No. 89128, 2007-0hio-6850. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.

O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., dissent.
